basic.description: Detailed examination of depositional processes and external controls on the facies organization and sequence stratigraphy of fluvial, coastal, shelf, and deep-marine environments. Introduction to sedimentary basin types.
basic.subject: GEOE
basic.title: Terrigenous Sedimentology

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: GEOE 238 or GEOL 238 or permission of the department. Must be registered in BSCE.
